comments:
Cheetah 20040630

When running the 'MoveTest' from the refactoring.tests plugin, the following
exceptions occur.
It seems that reason is the 'project.getOptions()' call on a project just
created but removes in a test before. 

java.lang.IllegalStateException: Preference node "org.eclipse.jdt.core" has been
removed.
